title: In-game Reporting
body:
Imagine this:

Scenario 1: You are in game, there is a scripted on either the enemy team or your team. 
Solution: report them in game and allow the ability to record and send a recording of gameplay to riot.

Scenario 2: Again, you are in game and there is a toxic player telling another player that he has no reason to live and he should just go kill himself.
Solution: report in game and send a section of the chat log to riot to be reviewed and analyzed, resulting in a ban

Imo this would solve so many problems if there was an in game banning system and recording system
